item.title: Building ActivityPub
item.description: Ghost is federating over ActivityPub to become part of the world’s largest publishing network. We had it pretty good for a while, back there. The early days of the web were chaotic, free, and open. Everyone published unique content on their own domain. No two sites looked the same.
